title: 我的世界clearlag配置文件问题(O_O)
txt_content: 为什么我的世界clearlag插件的配置文件不是中文的（发帖人说是汉化），我想改配置文件的提示改成[扫地的史蒂夫]，但是提示的时候还是英文，求大神解决★，clearlag的地址:http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... ;highlight=Clearlag

replies.author: KK44KK
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: intesr
replies.txt_content:
这是我的服务器配置，请查考，文件位置/plugins/ClearLag/config.yml。请使用notepad并使用utf8编码修改
#Auto-removal options
# -- warnings works like this; time = the time warning should be given, msg = warning message at that time
# -- NOTE: The below 'remove' section applies to this remover!
# -- NOTE: Putting the interval to low will cause issues!
auto-removal:
  broadcast-message: '&6[服务器娘] &5一库哟~！服务器娘吞掉 +RemoveAmount 份遗失精华!'
  broadcast-warning: true
  enable-scheduler: true
  autoremoval-interval: 460
  warnings:
        - time:400 msg:&6[服务器娘] &e服务器娘的欲望已被勾起,预计 &7+remaining &e秒后达到高潮,基佬们请坚持勿交货!
        - time:440 msg:&6[服务器娘] &e服务器娘已经开始抽搐,预计&7+remaining &e秒后达到高潮,基佬们务必坚持勿交货!复制代码

replies.author: Danking
replies.txt_content: 孩子，你把编码改成GB-2312看看
